name: Pink Pullover Hoodie
description: A pink hoodie with a soft texture, a heart-shaped logo on the back, and a cozy feel.

name: Salmon Pink Programming Hoodie
description: Salmon pink hoodie with a programming-themed graphic print on the front. It's made with a soft cotton blend fabric and features a front pouch pocket and adjustable drawstring hood.

name: Dessert Delight Layered Tee
description: White long sleeve tee with contrasting black sleeves and a printed image of a piece of cake on the front. The fabric is a comfortable cotton blend, and the shirt features a classic crew neck cut.

name: Ivory Classic Checked Flannel Shirt
description: Ivory flannel shirt with a blue checked pattern. The material is a soft and warm flannel, suitable for cooler weather. It has a button-up front, a turn-down collar, and a single chest pocket.

name: GAP Grey Hoodie
description: Grey hoodie with 'GAP' logo in black block letters across the chest. This hoodie is made from a soft, cotton-rich fabric with a fleece inner lining. It features a kangaroo pocket and an adjustable hood.

name: Ivory Striped Sweatshirt
description: Ivory-colored sweatshirt with three black stripes down the sleeves. The texture is smooth with a soft interior for comfort. It includes ribbed cuffs and a crew neckline, with a small Adidas logo on the front.

name: Essentials Beige Knit Sweatshirt
description: This is a beige knit sweatshirt with a relaxed fit and ribbed trim, featuring the word 'ESSENTIALS' in bold, contrasting black lettering on the front.

name: Green Crew Neck Sweatshirt
description: A casual green crew neck sweatshirt with contrasting black sleeves and the Jumpman logo.

name: Jordan Cream Hoodie
description: Cream hoodie with a soft fleece inner, a kangaroo pocket, and a discreet Jumpman logo on the upper left side.

name: Classic Black Button Up Shirt
description: A classic black button-up shirt made from premium cotton, featuring a sharp collar, adjustable cuffs, and the iconic red polo rider logo embroidered on the chest.

name: White Button Up Shirt
description: A crisp white button-up shirt tailored from quality cotton, showcasing a neat button placket, a classic collar, and a signature polo rider logo on the chest.

name: Beige Stripe Adorned Sweatshirt
description: This beige crew neck sweatshirt features the iconic Adidas three-stripe design on the sleeves and a small logo on the chest, crafted from a soft, comfortable fabric.

name: Black Graphic T Shirt
description: Black cotton t-shirt featuring a unique fox character graphic, with the text 'Maison Kitsune' below.

name: Black Denim Jeans
description: Black denim jeans with a straight fit, standard five-pocket design, and button closure. No distinct branding visible.

name: Light Blue Cuffed Jeans
description: Light blue washed denim jeans featuring a high-rise fit, cuffed hem, and button fly. Classic five-pocket configuration without visible branding.

name: Grey Wool Slacks
description: Grey woolen slacks with a pleated front, wide-leg cut, and side adjusters. No belt loops, with a concealed front fastening.

name: Oatmeal Cotton Joggers
description: Oatmeal-colored cotton joggers with an elastic waistband, drawstring, and ribbed ankle cuffs. Relaxed fit with no visible logos.

name: White Denim Jeans
description: White denim jeans with a mid-rise waist, button closure, and raw-edge hem. Standard five-pocket style, no obvious branding.

name: Flared Black Skirt
description: A flared black skirt with a textured pattern, elastic waistband, and a mid-thigh length cut.

name: Denim Mini Skirt
description: A blue denim mini skirt featuring a front zipper with button closure and a classic five-pocket design.

name: Floral Maxi Skirt
description: A flowy maxi skirt with a black background and small white floral print, featuring a comfortable waistband and a full-length drape.

name: Pleated Grey Skirt
description: A knee-length grey skirt with sharp pleats, a side zipper closure, and a smooth waistband.

name: Tennis style White Skirt
description: A white tennis-style skirt with pleated detailing, an elastic waistband, and a built-in short underlayer.

name: Classic Black Low Top Sneakers
description: Black low top sneakers with white side stripes, lace-up front, and gold branding on the tongue.

name: High Top Sneakers
description: High top black canvas sneakers with white laces, rubber sole, and a signature star ankle patch.

name: Classic Grey Running Shoes
description: Grey running shoes with a chunky sole, mesh upper panels, and reflective logo on the sides.

name: Checkered Slip On Sneakers
description: Slip-on sneakers with a black and white checkered pattern, elastic side accents, and a padded collar.

name: White Leather Low Top Sneakers
description: White leather low top sneakers with a perforated toe box, lace-up closure, and logo on the side and heel.

name: Beige Backpack with Leather Straps
description: Beige canvas backpack featuring tan leather straps, metallic buckles, a front pocket, and a branded patch.

name: Classic Black Backpack
description: Black backpack with a top handle, front pocket with a zipper, and a distinctive round logo patch.

name: Compact Belt Bag
description: Compact black belt bag with a zippered closure, adjustable strap, and subtle logo on the front.

name: Canvas Tote Bag
description: White canvas tote bag with navy trim, a large circular Lululemon logo, and sturdy shoulder straps.
